pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dephell_setuptoolsExtract meta information from `setup.py`.Install:```python3 -m pip install --user dephell_setuptools```CLI:```python3 -m dephell_setuptools ./setup.py```Lib:```pythonfrom pathlib import Pathfrom dephell_setuptools import read_setupresult = read_setup(path=Path('setup.py'))```
